solution_line_template: Twice the number of sharks in Daytona Beach is {daytona_sharks}*{multiplier_twice}=<<{daytona_sharks}*{multiplier_twice}={twice_daytona_sharks}>>{twice_daytona_sharks}
Cape May has {cape_may_more} more sharks than that which is {twice_daytona_sharks}+{cape_may_more}=<<{twice_daytona_sharks}+{cape_may_more}={cape_may_sharks}>>{cape_may_sharks}
